channel.title: Proactively Monitoring the Network Fabric on Cumulus Networks Documentation

item.title: MLAG Troubleshooting with NetQ
item.description: This chapter outlines a few scenarios that illustrate how you use NetQ to troubleshoot MLAG on Cumulus Linux switches. Each starts with a log message that indicates the current of MLAG state. All Nodes Are Up When the MLAG configuration is running smoothly, NetQ Notifier sends out a message that all nodes are up: 2017-05-22T23:13:09.683429+00:00 noc-pr netq-notifier[5501]: INFO: CLAG: All nodes are up Running netq show clag confirms this:
